name: UE4 Virtual Diorama - Downtown in the Fall
name_original: UE4 Virtual Diorama - Downtown in the Fall
description:
This is a little area I made in UE4 to walk around in.

The idea is that it's a small level with little interactivity but it's an area you could imagine being an actual place in the real world. It's supposed to be a relaxing little scene you wish you could visit.

Try walking near the doors of the various buildings and let your imagination do the rest.
